pages.title: The  Important Stuff<tm>
pages.text: Sophisticated Backpacks has a hotkey that will open a backpack you are wearing.$(br2)Without having to take it off and either put it on the ground or right-click while holding it in your hand.$(br2)$(l)This is a really useful thing to be able to do.$(o)$(br2)

JourneyMap has a hotkey that will drop a waypoint onto your map based on your location.$(br2)$(o)Without having to open the map screen$().$(br2)$(l)This is also very useful$().$(br2)They both want to use the same key and we will have to fix that in order to have them both.$()

pages.title: For JourneyMap:
pages.text: $(br2)$(l)SHIFT + c$()$(br)$(#939799)$(o)Create JourneyMap waypoint$()$(br2)$(l)c$()$(br)$(#939799)$(o)Create a JourneyMap waypoint $(l)when the full-screen map is open$()

pages.title: For Curios:
pages.text: $(br2)$(l)g$()$(br)$(#939799)$(o)Open your Curios Inventory to put on and take off items (like Backpacks)$()$(br2)
